headline: Hot 7.5% Yield Highlights Energy Midstream Giant MPLX
summary: MPLX, which formed in 2012 as a spinoff of Marathon Petroleum, operates Marathon's midstream assets of over 10,000 miles of pipelines throughout the Midwest.  MPLX has been a regular feature in Income Investor, and long-term investors have enjoyed both share appreciation and sizable distributions, as President Donald Trump's new administration has cut regulations and prioritized American energy.  In early May, MPLX reported first-quarter earnings of $1.10 per share, slightly below the consensus estimate of $1.12.
